metadata.job_title: Sr. Data Engineer(hands on Palantir exp.)

seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Sr. Data Engineer' and requires 8-10 years of experience, which aligns with senior level in data engineering hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Sr. Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines and platforms using Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark — technologies typically used for batch ETL processing rather than real-time streaming.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, mentoring, or architectural leadership; role appears focused on hands-on implementation.

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions Hadoop-based technologies (Hive, PySpark) which are typically deployed on-premise or in private clusters; no cloud providers listed.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned in skills or description.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Hadoop, Hive, and PySpark are primarily used for batch processing; no streaming technologies (e.g., Kafka, Flink) mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Dagster, etc.) mentioned in requirements or description.

storage_layer.evidence: Hadoop ecosystem implies data lake architecture; no data warehouse (Snowflake, Redshift) or lakehouse (Delta Lake) technologies mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Explicitly states 'Looking for locals only for onsite' and location is Atlanta, GA — implies regional restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Atlanta, GA, and 'locals only' implies US-based team with no global or multi-timezone focus.

relocation_required.evidence: Requires 'locals only for onsite' — implies candidate must already reside in or be willing to relocate to Atlanta, GA.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; 'locals only' implies preference for candidates already authorized to work in the US without sponsorship.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Requires 8-10 years experience and 'locals only' — unlikely to accommodate students on OPT/CPT.

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement, but 'locals only' implies must be authorized to work in the US (e.g., H1B, Green Card, Citizen).

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Implied by 'onsite' and 'locals only' — typical for W2 employees; no mention of contract or 1099 status.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career progression, promotion paths, or growth opportunities in job description or extracted data.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship, coaching, or working with senior staff in the job description.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career ladder in the job posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, architect, etc.) mentioned in the job description.

requirement_strictness.evidence: All listed skills are 'must-have' with no 'nice-to-have' items; 8-10 years experience is a strict requirement.

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific tools (Palantir Foundry, Hadoop, Hive, PySpark) — no hybrid or ambiguous roles mentioned.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 8-10 years experience is reasonable for a senior data engineer; skills align with senior-level expectations.
